value.title: Monitor Data Factory pipelines using Azure Monitor and Log Analytics | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: NOTE  Throughout this episode there are multiple references to Operations Management Suite; however, this solution actually uses Azure Monitor and Log Analytics.  Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Data Factory (ADF) integration with Azure Monitor, which enables you to route your

value.title: What is the difference between VSTS and Azure DevOps? | One Dev Question: Abel Wang
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Cloud Developer Advocate Abel Wang explains how Azure DevOps provides developer services to support teams to plan work, collaborate on code development, and build and deploy applications. In this video, Abel explains the differences between VSTS and Azure DevOps.   Get
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/x9IeTQAau3Q" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Automate your deployments with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Learn how to combine automation techniques such as infrastructure as code with automated pipelines to provision and configure the infrastructure you need to run your applications and services.

topItems.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.

topItems.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run configuration management tools in Azure Pipelines to help keep your infrastructure configured as you need.

value.title: Capture feedback and monitoring data to continuously improve your software
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
topItems.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.

topItems.title: Route system feedback to development teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Protect public sector data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn to design conceptual architecture for data classifications using data residency for Microsoft 365 and Dynamics 365 services while utilizing Azure regions and Customer lockbox. Manage breach notifications in Service Trust Portal and Azure Security Center. And encrypt data throughout its lifecycle.

topItems.title: Design cloud solutions for the public sector
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to the stakes and options for implementing Azure to safeguard public sector data.

topItems.title: Encrypt public sector data in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Overview of the options available for managing encryption keys and encrypting data throughout its lifecycle, with special attention to public sector.

value.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
value.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

value.title: Authenticate your Azure deployment pipeline by using service principals
value.excerpt: Learn how to create, manage, and grant permissions to service principals, which enable your deployment pipelines to securely authenticate to Azure.

value.title: Automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps
value.excerpt: Learn to automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps that handle repetitive tasks, enforce team policies, and maintain a tidy repository.

value.title: Build your first Bicep deployment pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Build a basic deployment pipeline for Bicep infrastructure as code templates by using Azure DevOps and Azure Pipelines. Learn how to use service connections to authenticate your deployment pipeline to Azure. Add triggers to configure the Bicep deployment pipeline to run whenever your main branch is updated.

value.title: Characterize DevOps Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement.

value.title: Ensure stable operations and optimization across all supported workloads deployed to the cloud.
value.excerpt: As workloads are deployed to the cloud, operations is critical to success.

value.title: Prepare for successful cloud adoption with a well-defined strategy
value.excerpt: Success in cloud adoption is predicated by a clear strategy that helps the team understand executive direction and regularly measure progress. This module will help capture the cloud adoption strategy needed to drive your success.

value.title: Deploy and maintain cloud-native apps with GitHub actions and Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: This module describes how to deploy and maintain cloud-native apps.

value.title: Configure Azure alerts
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure Azure alerts including action groups.

value.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Run configuration management tools in Azure Pipelines to help keep your infrastructure configured as you need.

value.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

value.title: Define the foundation pillars of DevOps: Architecture and Technology
value.excerpt: There are three things required to make DevOps happen: the cultural component, tools and technology, and architecture. Discover the last two foundation pillars of DevOps, Architecture and Technology!

value.title: Deploy ASP.NET web apps with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Azure Pipelines help automate building, deploying, and maintaining your applications. While they support a wide range of platforms and programming languages, in this module youâ€™ll focus on using them to implement ASP.NET apps on Azure App Service Web Apps with Azure SQL Database as their data store.

value.title: Rapidly develop and deploy Java apps using GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Create a Terraform configuration, provision your Azure resources, and set up your project for Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD) with GitHub Actions.

value.title: Automate Java container deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Java containers.

value.title: Automate Node.js deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement CI/CD pipeline for Node.js applications. Automate deployment of Vue, React, Angular or webpack apps with Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Automate Python deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Python.

value.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

value.title: Explore DevOps Continuous Security and Continuous Operations
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Security and Continuous Operations.

value.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Work with guidance from the Space Game web team to set up your build agent running on-premises or on an Azure virtual machine running in the cloud.

value.title: Implement change tracking and file integrity monitoring for Windows IaaS VMs
value.excerpt: Implement change tracking and file integrity monitoring for Windows IaaS VMs

value.title: Introduction to Azure DevTest Labs
value.excerpt: Evaluate whether Azure DevTest Labs is appropriate for setting up virtual machine environments for your team.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Monitor
value.excerpt: Learn what Azure Monitor is and where you would use it.

value.title: Load test Azure web apps by using Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Discover Azure portal and Azure DevOps tools that help you quickly and efficiently define and scale up load tests for apps.

value.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts
value.excerpt: In this module, the Space Game web team guides you through creating a build pipeline that produces a package that can be used by multiple applications.
